Docs.summary:
Gets or sets the maximum depth to constrain the validation visitor when validating.
traverses the object graph of the model being validated. For models that are very deep or are infinitely recursive, validation may result in stack overflow.
When not , will throw if current traversal depth exceeds the specified value.
